text: Anɨb ak tek, God Kawnan ne ak binɨb kɨlop kɨles ñek takaw yɨbɨl keke apal ak, binɨb yɨp gos ma lɨnepal okok nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl gup. Binɨb yɨp gos lɨnepal okok nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl ma gup. God pen binɨb kɨlop gos ñek agñɨbal ak, binɨb yɨp gos lɨnepal okok nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl gup. Binɨb yɨp gos ma lɨnepal okok nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl ma gup.
